movies.title: The Eves
movies.plot: A group of students are en route to the beach for spring break when their car overheats near a crumbling hunting lodge, leaving them alone and defenseless while an unseen force attacks them from all sides.
movies.simplePlot: A group of students are en route to the beach for spring break when their car overheats near a crumbling hunting lodge, leaving them alone and defenseless while an unseen force attacks them from all sides.

biography.bio: Matthew was born in Houston, Tx. but grew up in the small town of Fredericksburg staying actively involved in theater and sports during middle and high school. He was known as the "thespian jock." Matt continued on pace in college majoring in acting for theater at Texas State University where he was actively involved in many of the theater department's productions but also took strongly to the Greek life on campus. His fellow thespians in school would call him "Frat Matt" when he came around. In 2006, Matthew moved to Los Angeles to pursue acting while at the same time found work for a few indie production companies and stumbled upon producing before starting his own company with fellow producers Christian Sosa and Tyler Glodt in 2008. Since then, Matthew has starred in several indie features, shorts, commercials, and his company has produce one feature, "The Eves," as well as many other shorts.
biography.name: Matthew Albrecht

biography.bio: Stewart W. Calhoun is an actor and set decorator, known for The Eves (2012), Paradox Alice (2012) and Danny (2009).
biography.name: Stewart W. Calhoun

biography.bio: Cathy Baron was born on June 7, 1982 in San Antonio, Texas, USA as Catherine Anne Baron. She is known for her work on Justified (2010), In Time (2011) and Greek (2007).
biography.name: Cathy Baron

biography.bio: J.R. May was born on March 10, 1987 in Houston, Texas, USA. He is an actor, known for The Eves (2012), The Preacher's Daughter (2013) and Dreamer (2013).
biography.name: J.R. May

biography.bio: Amelia Meyers is an actress and composer, known for General Hospital (1963), Show Business (2016) and Days of Our Lives (1965).
biography.name: Amelia Meyers

biography.bio: Micah Sudduth is an actor and director, known for Black Metal (2013), The Last Word (2010) and The Eves (2012).
biography.name: Micah Sudduth

biography.bio: Corrie Loftin is an actress, known for The Eves (2012), Mind of Its Own (2010) and JoJo's Circus (2003).
biography.name: Corrie Loftin

biography.bio: Mark Leslie Ford is an actor and producer, known for Mars Project (2016), Suburbicon (2017) and Rush: Inspired by Battlefield (2016).
biography.name: Mark Leslie Ford

biography.bio: Fred Parker Jr. grew up in San Antonio, Texas where he began acting in the schools of the Northside Independent School District. He received a B.A. in Acting from the University of Texas at Austin. He has also trained and studied with the Upright Citizens Brigade and Warner Loughlin Studios. He is an active volunteer through the SAG foundation's Bookpals to promote literacy. Fred has been a mentor through United Way's Communities in Schools, and a swim coach through Kinetic Kids. He continues to visit high schools to promote education and encourages students to envision success.
biography.name: Fred Parker Jr.

biography.bio: Jackson Johnson is an actor, known for A Guy and a Girl (2009), The Eves (2012) and Down on the Ground (2010).
biography.name: Jackson Johnson

biography.bio: T. Michael O'Connor is an actor, known for The Eves (2012).
biography.name: T. Michael O'Connor

biography.bio: Phillip Albrecht is an actor and producer, known for The Eves (2012) and Buck Wild (2014).
biography.name: Phillip Albrecht

biography.bio: Melvin Luker is an actor, known for The Eves (2012).
biography.name: Melvin Luker

biography.bio: Jaime Gerik is an actress, known for The Eves (2012).
biography.name: Jaime Gerik

biography.bio: Leila Dallal is known for her work on Bernie (2011), Everybody Wants Some!! (2016) and Parkland (2013).
biography.name: Leila Dallal
